topic.title: Viewing Your Account Disk Space
topic.p: You see the percentage of your total disk space used for your account in the %of used section in your Control Panel.

ol.title: To view your account's disk space:

li.p: In the My Profile menu group, click View My Profile (expand the menu group to see the links, if necessary). For more information about expanding and collapsing menu groups, see Menus and Navigation.
The View My Profile window appears.

ol.li: Next to User Disk Space, Limit and Used appear. Limit represents the total amount of disk space available for virtual host Web sites, log files, file storage, and mail storage for all users in the account. Used represents the total amount of disk space currently being used by Web sites, log files, file storage, and mail storage for all users in the account.
